title: Lovely Snails
info: Adds tamable pet snails to the game

title: Macaw's Bridges
info: Adds a variety of craftable bridge blocks

title: Macaw's Doors
info: Adds additional craftable doors, including garage and gate doors

title: Macaw's Windows
info: Adds new varities of craftable windows, blinds, shutters, curtains, and more

title: Moar Concrete
info: Adds colored concrete slabs, stairs, walls, fences, gates, bricks, panels, and buttons

title: Potion Stacking
info: Allows potions to be stored and used in stacks of 16. Cooldown of 1 second between uses

title: Reinforced Barrels
info: Adds tiered barrel ugprades with increased storage capacity

title: Reinforced Chests
info: Adds tiered chest ugprades with increased storage capacity

title: Reinforced Shulker Boxes
info: Adds tiered shulker box ugprades with increased storage capacity

title: Stacked Blocks
info: Allows many blocks to be crafted 8:1 into stacked blocks using leads
